name: The Placeholder Pusher - dev demo
description:
Very early in development, uploaded for AGDG Demo Day 3. Could be broken...

This is a first person puzzle game chiefly about hitting things around with a club on a square grid and into coffins.

Controls:

- Move with [W][A][S][D]
- Click and release [Left Mouse Button] to swing your club
- Hold [Left Mouse Button] to charge the strength of your swing
- Press [R] to restart the current puzzle
- Press [Escape] to quit the game

There may be missing collision on some objects. I don't really know why yet.

Update: I rebuilt it a few times, tried some things out, went in and tested every bit of collision and had no problems. I uploaded this new build which is hopefully free of this collision bug.
